services.name: Basic Photo Editing
services.description: Colour correction, brightness/contrast adjustment, cropping, and minor touch-ups

services.name: Advanced Photo Editing
services.description: Retouching, background removal, object removal, and enhancing details

services.name: Bulk Photo Editing
services.description: Basic editing for a batch of photos (minimum 20 photos)

services.name: Basic Logo Design
services.description: Simple logo design with 2-3 concepts and revisions

services.name: Advanced Logo Design
services.description: Detailed logo design with 5 concepts, multiple revisions, and vector files

services.name: Editing Logo
services.description: Modifying existing logos (colour change, adding text, resizing)

services.name: Thumbnail Design
services.description: Creating eye-catching thumbnails for YouTube or social media

services.name: Bulk Thumbnail Design
services.description: Designing thumbnails for a series of videos (minimum 10 thumbnails)

services.name: Standard Video Editing
services.description: Includes basic editing plus colour correction, audio enhancement, and simple effects

services.name: Advanced Video Editing
services.description: Includes standard editing plus motion graphics, animations, and complex transitions

services.name: YouTube Video Editing
services.description: Complete editing for YouTube videos, including intro/outro, text overlays, and sound effects

services.name: Short Social Media Videos
services.description: Editing short videos (up to 1 minute) for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, etc.
